message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counteroffer at $125 for the product.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $135. This product is worth a lot to me, but I believe it would be equally valuable to you.
I see your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
